name: mountain-taxes
description: Node package for the repository as a whole

scripts.build:lambda: dotnet publish infrastructure/src/Lambda/Lambda.csproj -c Release -r linux-x64 --self-contained false -o infrastructure/src/Lambda/bin/Release/net8.0/publish
scripts.build:all: npm run build:lambda && npm run build:website
scripts.synth: npm run build:all && cdk synth --app "dotnet run --project infrastructure/src/Infrastructure/Infrastructure.csproj" --context name=taxes.mountaintechnologiesllc.com
scripts.diff: npm run build:all && cdk diff --app "dotnet run --project infrastructure/src/Infrastructure/Infrastructure.csproj" --context name=taxes.mountaintechnologiesllc.com
scripts.deploy:infra: npm run build:all && cdk deploy --app "dotnet run --project infrastructure/src/Infrastructure/Infrastructure.csproj" --context name=taxes.mountaintechnologiesllc.com --require-approval never
scripts.deploy: npm run build:all && cdk deploy --app "dotnet run --project infrastructure/src/Infrastructure/Infrastructure.csproj" --context name=taxes.mountaintechnologiesllc.com
scripts.deploy:full: npm run deploy:infra && npm run update-config && npm run build:website && npm run deploy:infra

author: Mountain Technologies LLC
